Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/18th
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at UIC/Halsted. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at UIC/Halsted. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
